text: Question 27 Let G = (V, E) be a simple undirected graph, and s be a particular vertex in it called the source. For â‚¬ V, let d(x) denote the shortest distance in G from s to x. A breadth first search (BFS) is performed starting at s. Let T be the resultant BFS tree. If (u,v) is an edge of G that is not in T, then which one of the following CANNOT be the value of d(u)-d(v)?
